name: Primed State
description:
"Primed State is a 2.5D science fiction side scrolling platformer where the player must escape from a sabotaged alien space station with their trusty Electrical Relay Device, whilst automated security droids and zero gravity environments stand in the way to their escape pod."

Designers

Cameron McKellar
Aruna Kurban
Sonya Stajkic
Michael Burrows
Luke McCarron

Artists

Hazel Ludlow
Finn Bassaletti
Polina Read
Emily Luke

Programmers

Gary Walker
Andrew Thornton
Lachlan Brown
